alert.note: Alert for Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:05PM CDT until August 03 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEBSTER COUNTY... At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Diggins, or 10 miles south of Marshfield, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Seymour... Fordland... Diggins... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
